entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
